name: Lakeside Capital Management
overview:
At Lakeside Capital Management our mission is to provide you with opportunities that protect and grow your wealth. Your net worth growth is our prioity.

Through Lakeside Capital you will find investment opportunities typically reserved for the ultra wealthy. Accessing a range of asset categories, we will diversify your investments and produce results that are designed to last for generations. In our opinion, these kinds of investments do not exist at banks, brokerage firms, or most wealth management companies, but they are available to you at Lakeside Capital. Wealth can complicate your finances. Our approach is designed to simplify the stresses that your finances can often create.

That said, managing your wealth requires more than just investment counseling. Thus, we utilize an extensive network of service professionals to handle your tax needs, estate planning, legal issues and bookkeeping.

funds.name: Middle-Market Mezzanine Capital Investment Fund
funds.source_description: Lakeside Capital Management Holds Final Close of Second Middle-Market Mezzanine Capital Investment Fund at $240M
